src.tasks package

Submodules

src.tasks.compression_tif module

src.tasks.compression_tif.compress(in_path, start, end, out_path, delete_in)

Compress tiff files

Parameters

  • in_path (str) – directory containing the input files

  • out_path (str) – directory containing the output files

  • start (int) – index of first file to process

  • end (int) – index of last file to process

  • delete_in (str) – delete input files, and folder if empty

src.tasks.yokogawa_to_zarr module

src.tasks.yokogawa_to_zarr.sort_fun(s)

sort_fun takes a string (filename of a yokogawa images), extract site and z-index metadata and returns them as a list.

Parameters

s (str) – filename

src.tasks.yokogawa_to_zarr.yokogawa_to_zarr(in_path, out_path, zarrurl, delete_in, rows, cols, ext, chl_list)

Convert Yokogawa output (png, tif) to zarr file

Parameters

  • in_path (str) – directory containing the input files

  • out_path (str) – directory containing the output files

  • zarrurl (str) – structure of the zarr folder

  • delete_in (bool) – delete input files, and folder if empty

  • rows (int) – number of rows of the plate

  • cols (int) – number of columns of the plate

  • ext (str) – source images extension

  • chl_list (list) – list of the channels
